title: WANTED | can anyone id. this font?
content:
seems close to a futura, but the stroke varies  
also what is the term for lowercase a which are round?

thank you so much

-Even

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706111125im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/WANTED-what-font-is-this_4483.jpg)

 [‹ ID help please](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706111125/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45119 "Go to previous forum topic") [ID: Taxi Driver title font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706111125/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45109 "Go to next forum topic")
author: EvenFair

comments.content:
The Header looks like Futura BT bold to me

p@

edit: and Futura BT light for the body
I don’t know this face; you’re right it is very similar to Futura but not quite. Lowercase ’a’s and ’g’s come in single- and double-storey designs. That’s the term.

Sorry took a bit to find a link  
 [Here](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706111125/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/futura/bold/)

p@
That’s the one. I compared it with one cut of Futura and said ’nope’. Oh well.
